intro: Tabernaemontana coronaria var. plena, commonly known as the Double Crowned Necklace Plant, is a striking evergreen shrub native to South Africa. It is characterized by its dense, fragrant white flowers that bloom in clusters, giving it a full, double-flowered appearance. The plant has dark green, glossy leaves that provide a lush backdrop to its showy blooms. It thrives in well-drained soil and prefers full sun to partial shade. This variety is prized for its ornamental value and is often used in gardens for its visual appeal and long flowering season.
